title: My Stomach
description: The digestive system is an important part of the body, and the stomach plays a critical role in digestion. Without it, we would not have energy or be able to grow. My Stomach provides students a comprehensive look at this amazing body part and the steps in digestion. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of simple subjects.
